What will you use your Doubly Points for? I
can trade them for coins or a capsule of your

244497.「ニャンコインが 必要になったら\n ちいさなメダルを たくさん持って\n また:
If you ever need more coins, come back with
lots of little medals...<end>

244498.「ニャンコインセールは\n １１日 ０５時５９分までじゃ。\n これを逃す手は:
The Nyancoin Sale ends at 05:59 on the 11th.
You don't want to miss this!<end>

244499.「今 新しいパックを 準備しているところでな。\n うまくいけば <tm%nM_:
I'm getting a new pack ready... Hopefully.<tm%nM_NEXT_TIME>I'll be able to add it on NyanNyan Day in
June, so please wait and see!<end>

244500.「む……。回収できるカプセルを\n 持っていないようじゃな。\n ガニャポンで手:
No... I don't think we have any capsules to
collect. The capsules you get from the
Gagnapons are collectable...<bw_break>

244501.「ちいさなメダルが 足りんようじゃ。\n ニャンコインと 交換するには\n <%:
We need more of those little medals... I'll
need <%nM_COIN_MEDAL> to exchange for the
coins. Sorry...<bw_break>

244510.「ニャンコインを 何個 ほしいのじゃ？\n ダブリィポイント <%nM_COIN:

244511.「ニャンコイン <%nM_NUM>個 じゃな？\n ダブリィポイント <%nM_:
Nyancoins <%nM_NUM>, right? It'll be
exchanged for <%nM_COST> Doubly Points, if
that's okay with you.<yesno>
<case 1><close>
<case 2><break>
<case_cancel><break>
<case_end>

244513.「ちまたでは ネコが 大人気らしくてのう。 \n いろいろな姿と色をしたネコの:
Cats seem to be all the rage around here... We decided to hand out tokens with cats of all shapes and colors... But it's not fun to
just hand them out... Don't you think it'd be more exciting if you didn't know which cat would come? That's why I used alchemy to
create this randomized tokens capsule delivery device called "Ganyapon". I'll make Follow-Cunts forever and ever, sell my name,
and continue my research on the perfect magical creature!

244514.「ガニャポンを使うのに 必要なコインじゃ。\n ちいさなメダル <%nM_COI:
I need the coins to use the Gagnapon. A small medal <%nM_COIN_MEDAL> can be exchanged for one Nyan coin... The medal owner will
exchange the medal for a variety of things. What I want... It's a secret!

244515.「もしも すでに 手に入れたカプセルや\n こいつは いらんというカプセルが 出:
If you come across any capsules that you've already acquired, or any capsules that you don't want, rest assured, I will take them.
In exchange, I'll give you some Doubly Points. These points can be exchanged for Nyancoins or capsules of your choice!

244516.「わしは おのれの意思を持ち 自由に行動する \n 完全なる魔法生物を作ることを:
My goal is to create a magical creature with a mind of its own and the freedom to act as it pleases. I'm trying to catch up with her.
... Right now, I can only manage to keep up with the Followers, who follow their owners around at will. But I'll never give up...
Someday, I'll create a magical creature more perfect than the one you created. Oh... Oh, yeah... I'm going to give this capsule to an
elven man named Karuta, a toymaker in the wind town of Aztlan. He'll open the capsule and take out your tails... He'll also tell
you how to use it.

244517.「ほほう 勉強熱心じゃな。感心 感心。\n 何について 聞きたいのじゃ？\n<b:
You're very studious... I'm impressed. What
do you want to know about?<break>

244518.「他にも 何か 聞きたいことは あるかの？\n<break>: Is there anything else you'd like to ask me?<break>
